attribs.name: proficiencies

bronze dragon ancestry

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KkdB1JnvI-kKZxj48JG_content
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KkdBHIEO6XEgZk9he1J_content
attribs.current:
Includes:

• a backpack

• a bedroll

• a mess kit

• a tinderbox

• 10 torches

• 10 days of rations

• a waterskin

• 50 feet of hempen rope

attribs.name: spells_level_0_macro_var
attribs.current: [Fire Bolt](~repeating_spell0_-kkdbn5isokavsfszho7_spell), [Chill Touch](~repeating_spell0_-kkdbt1yjux9uzirun-k_spell), [Light](~repeating_spell0_-kkdcedmdxfmopgqyaju_spell), [Shocking Grasp](~repeating_spell0_-kkdchyvidoicz-j42cx_spell), [Eldritch Blast](~repeating_spell0_-kkdimhqm947jmavjzor_spell), [Minor Illusion](~repeating_spell0_-kkdj2fiprr2lvwkerez_spell)

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KkdBn5isOkAvsfsZHO7_content
attribs.current:
You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

This spell's damage increases by 1d10 when you reach 5th level (2d10), 11th level (3d10), and 17th level (4d10).

attribs.current: {{content=@{content}}} {{attack_type_macro=[Ranged Spell Attack:](~repeating_spell0_attack)}} {{has_attack_damage=1}} {{attack_damage_crit=[[[[ceil((@{level} + 2) / 6)]]d10]]}} {{attack_damage=[[[[ceil((@{level} + 2) / 6)]]d10[damage]]]}} {{attack_damage_type=fire}} {{has_attack_damage=1}} {{attack_damage_macro=[Hit:](~repeating_spell0_attack_damage)}} {{attack_damage_crit_macro=[Crit:](~repeating_spell0_attack_damage_crit)}} {{@{shaped_d20}=1}} {{attack1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[proficient] + 3[cha] + 1[global spell attack bonus]]]}} {{range=120 ft}} {{cast_as_level=@{cast_as_level_0}}}

attribs.current: +7 to hit, range 120 ft, one target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KkdBt1yJUx9uZIruN-K_content
attribs.current:
You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature to assail it with the chill of the grave. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 necrotic damage, and it can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn. Until then, the hand clings to the target.

If you hit an undead target, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

This spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.current: {{content=@{content}}} {{attack_type_macro=[Ranged Spell Attack:](~repeating_spell0_attack)}} {{has_attack_damage=1}} {{attack_damage_crit=[[[[ceil((@{level} + 2) / 6)]]d8]]}} {{attack_damage=[[[[ceil((@{level} + 2) / 6)]]d8[damage]]]}} {{attack_damage_type=necrotic}} {{has_attack_damage=1}} {{attack_damage_macro=[Hit:](~repeating_spell0_attack_damage)}} {{attack_damage_crit_macro=[Crit:](~repeating_spell0_attack_damage_crit)}} {{@{shaped_d20}=1}} {{attack1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[proficient] + 3[cha] + 1[global spell attack bonus]]]}} {{range=120 ft}} {{cast_as_level=@{cast_as_level_0}}}

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KkdBt1yJUx9uZIruN-K_attack_string
attribs.current: +7 to hit, range 120 ft, one target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KkdCEdmDxfMOPGQyAJu_content
attribs.current:
You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.

If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KkdCHyVidOIcZ-J42Cx_content
attribs.current:
Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage, and it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KkdCHyVidOIcZ-J42Cx_attack_string
attribs.current: +7 to hit, range Touch, one target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KkdCkFIAP8aIoGer42w_content
attribs.current: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4+1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KkdCkFIAP8aIoGer42w_higher_level
attribs.current: At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KkdClkXepVqC6Sk99jm_content
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KkdCzx3-iPxTd7zm53S_content
attribs.current: You can use your sorcery points to gain additional spell slots, or sacrifice spell slots to gain additional sorcery points.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KkdCzx4o7nRLGvmFO1n_content
attribs.current:
Creating Spell Slots. You can transform unexpended sorcery points into one spell slot as a bonus action on your turn. You can create spell slots no higher in level than 5th.Any spell slot you create with this feature vanishes when you finish a long rest.
Spell Slot  Sorcery Point Cost
   1st     2
   2nd     3
   3rd     5
   4th     6
   5th     7
Converting a Spell Slot to Sorcery Points. As a bonus action on your turn, you can expend one spell slot and gain a number of sorcery points equal to the slot's level.

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KkdEIo86eRhqhC6Eq2O_content
attribs.current:
A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

In addition, unsecured objects that are completely within the area of effect are automatically pushed 10 feet away from you by the spell's effect, and the spell emits a thunderous boom audible out to 300 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KkdEIo86eRhqhC6Eq2O_roll_formula
attribs.current: {{content=@{content}}} {{saving_throw_vs_ability=CONSTITUTION}} {{saving_throw_dc=14}} {{has_saving_throw_damage=1}} {{saving_throw_damage=[[2d8[damage] + [[(@{higher_level_query_1} - 1) * 1]]d8[higher level]]]}} {{saving_throw_damage_type=thunder}} {{has_saving_throw_damage=1}} {{saving_throw_damage_macro=[Saving throw failure:](~repeating_spell1_saving_throw_damage)}} {{saving_throw_success=Half damage and not pushed}} {{higher_level=@{higher_level}}} {{cast_as_level=@{higher_level_query_1}}}

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KkdEIo86eRhqhC6Eq2O_higher_level
attribs.current: At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KkdESAIg-iWcgSUPPNU_content
attribs.current:
You gain the ability to twist your spells to suit your needs. You gain two of the following Metamagic options of your choice. You gain another one at 10th and 17th level.
You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless otherwise noted.
Careful Spell, Distant Spell, Empowered Spell, Extended Spell, Heightened Spell, Quickened Spell, Subtle Spell, Twinned Spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KkdGJQRfd-cUX1Hczdz_content
attribs.current:
You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several.

Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage.

attribs.current: {{content=@{content}}} {{attack_type_macro=[Ranged Spell Attack:](~repeating_spell2_attack)}} {{has_attack_damage=1}} {{attack_damage_crit=[[2d6]]}} {{attack_damage=[[2d6[damage]]]}} {{attack_damage_type=fire}} {{has_attack_damage=1}} {{attack_damage_macro=[Hit:](~repeating_spell2_attack_damage)}} {{attack_damage_crit_macro=[Crit:](~repeating_spell2_attack_damage_crit)}} {{@{shaped_d20}=1}} {{attack1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[proficient] + 3[cha] + 1[global spell attack bonus]]]}} {{range=120 ft}} {{higher_level=@{higher_level}}} {{cast_as_level=@{higher_level_query_2}}} {{macros=[Scorching Ray repeat](~repeating_spell2_repeat)}}

attribs.current: At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional ray for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KkdGJQRfd-cUX1Hczdz_attack_string
attribs.current: +7 to hit, range 120 ft, one target.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KkdGuqcgdSNY4oIxRHm_content
attribs.current:
When you roll damage for a spell, you can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll [[@{charisma_mod}]] damage dice (minimum of one). You must use the new rolls.
You can use Empowered Spell even if you have already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KkdGvSXIk08DsiZFilI_content
attribs.current: When you cast a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, you can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

attribs.name: repeating_feat_-KkdHqr4FOSzq80kHaxD_content
attribs.current:
When you cast a spell that requires you to make an attack roll, the spell’s range is doubled.
    Your ranged spell attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.
    You learn one cantrip that requires an attack roll. Choose the cantrip from the bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell list. Your spellcasting ability for this cantrip depends on the spell list you chose from: Charisma for bard, sorcerer, or warlock; Wisdom for cleric or druid; or Intelligence for wizard.

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KkdIMHQM947jmAVJZor_content
attribs.current:
A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage.

The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at 5th level, three beams at 11th level, and four beams at 17th level. You can direct the beams at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each beam.

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KkdIMHQM947jmAVJZor_roll_formula
attribs.current: {{content=@{content}}} {{attack_type_macro=[Ranged Spell Attack:](~repeating_spell0_attack)}} {{has_attack_damage=1}} {{attack_damage_crit=[[1d10]]}} {{attack_damage=[[1d10[damage]]]}} {{attack_damage_type=force}} {{has_attack_damage=1}} {{attack_damage_macro=[Hit:](~repeating_spell0_attack_damage)}} {{attack_damage_crit_macro=[Crit:](~repeating_spell0_attack_damage_crit)}} {{@{shaped_d20}=1}} {{attack1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[proficient] + 3[cha] + 1[global spell attack bonus]]]}} {{range=120 ft}} {{cast_as_level=@{cast_as_level_0}}} {{macros=[Eldritch Blast repeat](~repeating_spell0_repeat)}}

attribs.current: +7 to hit, range 120 ft, one target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KkdIl2E7PNioyq0M21o_content
attribs.current: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

attribs.name: repeating_spell0_-KkdJ2fiPrR2lvwKereZ_content
attribs.current:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. The illusion also ends if you dismiss it as an action or cast this spell again.

If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

If you create an image of an object - such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest - it must be no larger than a 5-foot cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, because things can pass through it.

If a creature uses its action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KkdJdyVzFQbneZ3lET8_materials
attribs.current: A bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KkdJdyVzFQbneZ3lET8_content
attribs.current:
A stroke of lightning forming a line of 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The lightning ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KkdJdyVzFQbneZ3lET8_higher_level
attribs.current: At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KkdKAivumQeUuoS80Hn_content
attribs.current: Starting at 6th level, when you Cast a Spell that deals damage of the type associated with your draconic ancestry, you can add your Charisma modifier to one damage roll of that spell. At the same time, you can spend 1 sorcery point to gain Resistance to that damage type for 1 hour.

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KkdKm5LZe3kkZraGGL1_materials
attribs.current: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KkdKm5LZe3kkZraGGL1_content
attribs.current:
A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KkdKm5LZe3kkZraGGL1_higher_level
attribs.current: At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: Search for magic beyond mortal power

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KkdQs7Vg8G9WPcX2fvQ_content
attribs.current: While holding this wand, you gain a bonus to spell attack rolls determined by the wand’s rarity. In addition, you ignore half cover when making a spell attack.

attribs.name: repeating_spell4_-Kkdem0tjDBf64k7lpLW_content
attribs.current:
Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. The target takes 8d8 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

If you target a plant creature or a magical plant, it makes the saving throw with disadvantage, and the spell deals maximum damage to it.

If you target a nonmagical plant that isn't a creature, such as a tree or shrub, it doesn't make a saving throw, it simply withers and dies.

attribs.name: repeating_spell4_-Kkdem0tjDBf64k7lpLW_higher_level
attribs.current: At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.
